entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add support for Partitioned Cookies #53224
    .NET 9 Planning
  • gRPC service fails when called from parent directory #53223
  • [Blazor] NPE in ExternalLogin.razor in the Blazor Web App with auth template #53221
  • Epic: Eventing Framework in .NET 9 #53219
    9.0.0
  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter #53218
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext #53217
  • .NET 8 Blazor NavigationManager not always initialized when used in AuthorizationHandler #53216
  • [Blazor] Generate modern JS outputs that can be consumed by other JS toolchains (Blazor->JS) #53215
  • [Blazor] Modernize our Blazor JS assets and their delivery mechanism. #53214
  • FormFeature forces uploaded files to specify a filename directive in Content-Disposition header #53211
  • UseStatusCodePagesWithRedirects not working #53210
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #53207
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext #53206
  • Blazor SSR using Iframe is not working #53205
  • Loading static assets from wwwroot folder returns 404 not found in Blazor8 #53204

Closed

  • Perf regression: updates #53203
  • Asset size limit warnings when building in CodeSpaces #47324
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Allow import of Blazor and DotNet JS objects from Blazor WASM startup script #48974
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Unify ViewBuffer logic between MVC and Blazor #49932
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Ensure ability to customize the HtmlEncoder used for the RazorComponentEndpoint #47477
    8.0.x
  • [StringLength] Attribute makes nullable string required in blazor #53179

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Locker GitHub action to only lock issues (not PRs) #53225
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Prevent NPE in ExternalLogin.razor #53222
    area-mvc, area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • [Infrastructure] [release/8.0] Update eslint js doc plugin #53220
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Accept an HTML encoder instance from DI if available #53213
    area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • Added a null check in ResolveHasInvalidAntiforgeryValidationFeature() #53208
    community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • fix: Added missing AddOptions() to AddLocalization. #53016
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Remove checked-in JS files #53209
    area-blazor
  • [release/6.0] [Blazor] Fix duplicated place holder in log message #53009
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, community-contribution, 6.0.27
  • [Blazor] Accept an HTML encoder instance from DI if available #53140
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Centralize our JS build setup #53150
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [Blazor] Auto render mode improvements #53159
    area-blazor
  • Allow user to specify antiforgery request token source #51962
    community-contribution, feature-mvc-antiforgery, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • Throw if resolving keyed service from non-keyed container #53051
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • [Blazor] Dispatch inbound activity handlers in Blazor Web apps #53185
    area-blazor
  • Add polymorphic support to SignalR STJ #53035
    area-signalr
  • Always install node & build node components in CI #53154
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #53157
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Support resolving MethodInfo from strongly-typed route handler delegate #53184
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, feature-rdf
  • Add .NET Standard 2.0 TFM to WebUtilities and Headers #52801
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/6.0] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #53158
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *, 6.0.x
  • Enable gRPC tests on MacOS 12 #53186
    area-grpc
  • Use an image w/ node for SourceBuild #52969
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add null check for connectionId #52672
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
